scripts.www: cd www && mkdir -p __/firebase && curl https://delern-debug.firebaseapp.com/__/firebase/init.js -o __/firebase/init.js && polymer serve -H 0.0.0.0
scripts.//: bower has --allow-root flag to run on CI
scripts.build: firebase-bolt database.rules.bolt && cd www && bower --allow-root install && polymer build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase --project=${PROJECT?} deploy && cd appengine && gcloud --project=${PROJECT?} app deploy --version=ci app.yaml cron.yaml
